original_text: And the days that David reigned over Israel were forty years: seven years reigned he in Hebron, and thirty and three years reigned he in Jerusalem.
korean_text: 다윗이 이스라엘 왕이 된 지 사십 년이라 헤브론에서 칠 년 동안 다스렸고 예루살렘에서 삼십삼 년 동안 다스렸더라

sentences.original_text: And the days that David reigned over Israel
seven years reigned he in Hebron,
and thirty and three years reigned he in Jerusalem.
